docs.lead_paragraph: Food producers focus on factors such as yield, at the expense of flavor.

docs.lead_paragraph: The study by the World Health Organization and World Bank examined access to health services like prenatal care, child immunization and access to clean water.

headline.main: 400 Million Lack Basic Health Services, Report Finds
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Science and Heallth; 400 Million Lack Access to Health Care, Report Says

docs.abstract: World Health Organization and World Bank release report finding that at least 400 million people worldwide do not have access to essential health services.
docs.snippet: The study by the World Health Organization and World Bank examined access to health services like prenatal care, child immunization and access to clean water.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Pakistani government shut down the offices of the international aid group Save the Children in the capital, Islamabad, accusing it of violating its own charter.

headline.print_headline: Pakistan Shuts Offices of Save the Children

docs.lead_paragraph: The anti-hunger agency of the United Nations said the 30 percent cut, which could last for months, was designed to conserve dwindling supplies and funds.

headline.main: As Supplies Dwindle, World Food Program Cutting Rations to Refugees in Kenya
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; Food Rations Cut for Refugees in Kenya

docs.abstract: United Nations World Food Program will make temporary 30 percent cut in rations distributed to refugees in northern Kenyan camps, third time it has had to reduce Kenyan rations since 2013, in effort to conserve dwindling supplies and funding.
docs.snippet: The anti-hunger agency of the United Nations said the 30 percent cut, which could last for months, was designed to conserve dwindling supplies and funds.

docs.lead_paragraph: The proposal, which is scheduled to be presented on Wednesday, was denounced by restaurant representatives as overregulation.

headline.main: De Blasio Administration Wants High-Sodium Warnings on Menus
headline.print_headline: Mayor Wants Menus to Warn About Sodium

docs.abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio will present plan to Board of Health that would require large chain restaurants to indicate menu items containing more than 100 percent of recommended daily intake of sodium.
docs.snippet: The proposal, which is scheduled to be presented on Wednesday, was denounced by restaurant representatives as overregulation.

docs.lead_paragraph: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.

headline.main: QVC’s David Venable: The Man Who Helps America Cook
headline.print_headline: The Man Who Helps America Cook

docs.abstract: David Venable, best-selling cookbook author and host of cooking show on QVC network, has mastered art of marketing culinary equipment and books to suburban, Middle America audience eager for connection; recipe for his summer squash fritters with garlic dipping sauce given.
docs.snippet: Whether selling skillets, cookbooks, lobster or hot dogs, David Venable, QVC’s top food pitchman, is a culinary tower of power. Especially when he does his happy dance.

headline.main: Science Fails to See Benefits of Eating Placenta

docs.abstract: Though recommended for everything from pain reduction to preventing postpartum depression, researchers found no good evidence that the practice offered any health advantages.
docs.snippet: Though recommended for everything from pain reduction to preventing postpartum depression, researchers found no good evidence that the practice offered any health advantages.
